answers.answer: I had the two hour test it sucked so I know how you feel :/ why did you fail levels too high or  Did it make you sick? I wish you luck keep us posted
I had  the 2hour one .. And then i got a letter in the mail from my doc saying i have to do the 3hour one :(  i dont wanna :(
They didn't tell you why? That's weird! Well hopefully all goes well and you pass with flying colors :)) just don't stress

They said it was slightly elevated. I know over 140 and they make you take the 3 hr one. I'm going to ask before they do anything. Some doctors want you under 135, and if they say I was 139 or something I'm going home lol
I talked to my boss who's had diabetes for 30 years and he said 140 isn't bad at all. So Idk
Well I hope your test goes well. It might be different because f beig pregnant so I would t leave without getting an explanation but I'm sure you'll be fine! Good luck
having low sugar high sugar its all bad. I just had lunch and my sugar was 106 so no wonder I was feeling bad before.
Good luck momma!! I had the 2 hr one and it wasn't fun at all. But I brought my cousin to keep me occupied Lol I'm sure you'll do fine! They just want to make sure good luck :)

Had my three hour glucose test yesterday and it s u c k e d. The couldn't find my veins so I had blood drawn from the same spot four times! Two different nurses tried lol crossing my fingers that I passed!

question: I have my second glucose test today. The 3 hour one in a few hours. I'm so nervous. I hope I pass this one
title: second glucose test today
